articles.description: Some of Manchester United’s hierarchy are not convinced by one of Erik ten Hag’s summer transfer targets as the Dutchman looks to turn things around at Old Trafford.
articles.content:
Manchester United target Pau Torres has not convinced some of the club’s hierarchy that he would be the right signing for the team, according to transfer insider Dean Jones.

articles.author: Jacob Ranson
articles.title: 'Those who say Ronaldo is better than Messi know nothing about football,' insists Marco van Basten - Daily Mail
articles.description: PSG forward Messi and Manchester United star Ronaldo have been compared for years in the debate of who is the best player in the world as they gone head-to-head in their glittering careers.
articles.content:
Former Holland manager Marco van Basten has insisted anyone that thinks Cristiano Ronaldo is better than Lionel Messi knows nothing about football.
